name: Intra-Community
note: Invoice issued in accordance with Article 17, Paragraph 2 of Presidential Decree No. 633 dated October 26, 1972, the application of VAT is the responsibility of the recipient.
note@it: Fattura emessa ai sensi dell’art. 17, comma 2 del DPR 26/10/1972 n. 633, l’applicazione dell’IVA è a carico del destinatario.

name: Split Payment
note: Operations subject to split payment – the seller does not collect the VAT pursuant to ex art.17-ter of the D.P.R. 633/1972, the buyer is obliged to pay the Revenue Agency.
note@it: Operazione soggetta a split payment – il cedente non incassa l’Iva ai sensi dell’ex art.17-ter del D.P.R. 633/1972, l’acquirente è obbligato al versamento all’Agenzia delle Entrate.

name: Construction Subcontractors - RC
note: Operation subject to Reverse Charge and exempt from stamp duty – the seller does not collect the VAT pursuant to ex art.17, comma 6, letter a, DPR 633/1972
note@it: Operazione soggetta a reverse charge ed esente da imposta da bollo – il cedente non incassa l’Iva ai sensi dell’ex art. 17, comma 6, lettera a, DPR 633/1972.
